title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor. It takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be shown.
OB: The checkboxes are not using a busy cursor during the update process.
EB: During the update process, a busy cursor should be displayed to indicate that the operation is in progress.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. In a workspace with many projects, go to the Export Zip feature. 2. Select all projects. 3. Choose file types and select some. 4. Press OK.
